Text: will this game work on my latop ? i have been playing ps1 games by using epsxe1.7.0 so thoutht this would work downloaded it an tried playing using epxe an screen just goes black any help please?

It's PSP not PSx.  You'll need PCSP PSP Emulator - http://www.emulator-zone.com/download.php/emulators/psp/pcsp/pcsp_v0.5.4.zip

Still no promises, not all games/versions work with it and you'll need a good computer.
